entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h early this afternoon. High 23. Humidex 25. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers and risk of a thunderstorm. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h after midnight. Low 8. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 23. POP 30%
